::Shadow Wing::

She heard the voice, it was clearer now.  She felt her mind run wild.
"Yes, I can hear you. Who are you? Where is Lunarpine? What's 
happening?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> As he tinkered with the receptors words began to 
> form. "Matrix", "name," and most dominantly "Lunarpine." Shadow 
Wing 
> was truly a remarkable piece of work. Veratis was getting the 
chance 
> that most science bots only dreamed of. He was monitoring a 
protoform 
> merging with a spark.
> 
> "I wonder what would happen if I... Yes that WILL work." he thought 
> as he removed another set of equipment from it's case. he hooked up 
> to himself, hopefully causing a link between the subject and 
himself. 
> The words were clearer now that he was directly linked. 
> 
> He repeated his last message "Shadow Wing, can you understand me?"
>
